CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK("http://maps.google.com/maps?q="&Street&","&City&"%20"&State&"%20"&PostalCode&"&t=m&z=13",
IMAGE(
"http://maps.google.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + Street + "," + City + "," + State + " " + PostalCode +"&zoom=13&size=650x250&markers=color:blue|" + Street + "," + City + "," + State + " " + PostalCode + "&sensor=false&format=png32" , "no map available", 250, 650))
CustomField.label: Location
